europeana:record.dc:title: An undescribed lobate ctenophore, Lobatolampea tetragona gen. nov. & spec. nov., representing a new family, from Japan
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Horita T.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Invertebrata: overige
Ctenophora
Lobatolampeidae fam. nov.
Lobatolampea tetragona gen. nov. & spec. nov.
lobate
medusoid
Japan
europeana:record.dc:description: Lobatolampea tetragona gen. nov. & spec. nov. was collected from coastal waters of Ise Bay, near Toba, Pacific coast of middle Japan. It assumes a medusoid bell-shape when floating, but is nearly discshaped when resting on the bottom. It is characterized by four C-shaped gonads present on the distal part of the subpharyngeal meridional canals, beyond the oral end of the comb rows. “Primitive” oral lobes are also formed and ctenes are found at the site of the presumptive auricles. The morphology of this species differs from any previously described larval or adult form, and is intermediate between the orders Cydippida and Lobata. The larvae are of the cydippid type.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: An undescribed lobate ctenophore, Lobatolampea tetragona gen. nov. & spec. nov., representing a new family, from Japan (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 73, 12-33)
